import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import useGlobalState from "../globalState"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; function BuyNow() { let navigate = useNavigate(); const { id } = useParams(); const [log, setLog] = useGlobalState('login'); const [user, setUser] = useGlobalState('username'); const [product, setResult] = useState({}); useEffect(() => { console.log(log); if (log) { fetch("/api/product/" + id) .then(response => response.json()) .then(data => { setResult(data); // console.log(data) }); } //else { //alert(log); //navigate("/login"); //} }, [log, product]); return (

Invoice ID: {product._id}

Rajput Traders
{/* */}
To: {user}
Street, City
State, Country
111-111-111
{/* */}
Invoice
ID: #{product._id}
Issue Date: {new Date().toLocaleString('en-us', { month: 'short', day: 'numeric', year: 'numeric' })}
Status: Unpaid
{/* */}
#
Description
Qty
Unit Price
Amount
1
{product.name}
1
₹{product.price}
₹{product.price}
{/*

$15

$₹{product.price}
Tax (10%)
$₹{Number(product.price) / 10}
Total Amount
₹{product.price + Number(product.price) / 10}
Thank you for your business
Pay Now


) } export default BuyNow;
